divs: Sighting DetailsAT APROX 6:00PM SUN JUN 28 MY FRIEND AND I WERE SWIMMING IN MY POOL.IN MY BACK YARD. WE WERE IN THE MIDDLE OF A CONVERATION AND ALL OF A SUDDEN SHE SAYS, LOOK, WHAT THE HELL IS THAT. I LOOKED AND IT WAS A WHITE CYLANDER SHAPED CRAFT WITH NO WINGS,(LIKE AN AIRPLANE WITH NO TRAIL) IT WAS SO HIGH IN THE SKY,COULD NOT BE A GLYDER. JUST MOVED ON AT A STEADY SPEED FROM NORTH TO SOUTH OVER RAYMORE MISSOURI.I GOT OUT OF THE POOL TO BE ABLE TO SEE WITHOUT MY TREES BEING THE WAY. IT CONTINUED UNTIL IT WAS OUT OF SIGHT AT THE SAME SPEED, A SPEED LIKE A SINGLE ENGINE PLANE, BUT TO FAR UP TO BE ONE AND NO WINGS. MY FRIEND SAYS SHE THOUGHT SHE SAW WHAT LOOKED LIKE SOMETHING AT THE BACK END, THAT REMINDED HER OF A ROCKET. IM WANTING TO KNOW IF ANYONE IN THIS AREA SAW THIS?
Summary: A white cylinder shaped craft with what looked like a rocket type rear end. There was no wings like an airplane, and too high in the sky for a glyder. No air trail left like a jet. just continued in the same north to south pattern at a high speed.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Raymore
There were no other sightings in Raymore on or around June 28th 2009
